original_text: But Adonijah was afraid of what Solomon would do to punish him. So he ran to the holy tent. He took hold of the horns of the altar there.
korean_text: 아도니야도 솔로몬을 두려워하여 일어나 가서 제단 뿔을 잡으니

sentences.original_text: of what Solomon would do to punish him
sentences.korean_translation: 솔로몬이 그를 벌하기 위해 무엇을 할까 하고

sentences.original_text: So he ran to the holy tent
He took hold of the horns of the altar there
